name: Web Research
description: Search with AI-powered web search engines

promptTemplates.extract:
Extract and optimize the search query from the voice command.
Required: query (the optimized search query)

Transform casual speech into an effective search query.
Output ONLY valid JSON with the extracted parameters.
promptTemplates.content:
Optimize this search query for better results.

Rules:
1. Convert Chinese queries to English if searching English content
2. Add relevant technical terms
3. Remove filler words
4. Keep it focused and specific
5. Output ONLY the optimized query, nothing else
